NOTES:

KH (9/14/2001 5:07:41 PM)
	Workbench needs to do a better job handling errors. Distinguish between development and runtime as well 
as increase the survivability.

Moving to Core. This is related to improved servicability. Please work with 
Eduardo, he is going to fix the JFace/UI side of this.

Dirk, this is an alarming bug in very low level code.  Do you still have that 
workspace available?  Was it repeatable?  Was your workspace still usable 
after that point?  Is there any more useful information you can provide?  

Eduardo: as far as servicability, we return a multi-status from the build, whose 
message is "Errors during build".  The UI must not be looking at the children of 
this multi-status where the real explanation is.

Of course I do ;-). You can find it under
